sentence: Philippa Carr MW, the brain behind the fun, educational Wine Atlas range, has found another fantastic buy. This is made from an old native grape, Feteasca Neagra, and by the giant state-of-the-art winery Cramele Recas, known for its great-value, entry-level wines. Juicy and fresh with generous plum and strawberry fruit, with a peppery edge.
